DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the survival benefit associated with Zemplar therapy as compared to Calcijex for the treatment of secondary hyperparathyroidism in subjects with Stage V chronic kidney disease on hemodialysis as measured by time to death.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate the Survival Benefits of Zemplar Versus Calcijex in Subjects w/ Stage V Chronic Kidney Disease on Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: Stage V Chronic Kidney Disease Patients on Hemodialysis requiring treatment for secondary hyperparathyroidism with vitamin D therapy
